name: Angry Birds Classic Texture File
summary: Learn about .ZSTREAM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

description: A ZSTREAM file is a texture used in Angry Birds Classic and other old Angry Birds video games. It contains an image used to show an in-game background, item, or character. ZSTREAM files are contained in .stream.7z files, which are .7Z archives found in Angry Birds games' data/​images/​base directories.

instructions: If you want to view the image a ZSTREAM file contains, you can use the AngryBirdsClassic_Android_zstream Python script and Noesis (Windows) to convert your ZSTREAM file to a .PNG file. Then, you can open the PNG file in any image viewing application.
